description: A suit of Gothic plate armor. Handmade from superalloy plates, for better protection at lower weight.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A suit of Gothic plate armor, reinforced with kevlar at the joints for better protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A suit of superalloy Gothic plate armor, reinforced with kevlar at the joints for better protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A lightweight, home-built, skin-tight suit of kevlar and fabric. Minor protection from harm while keeping everything squared away under your other armor. Accentuates your... survivability.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A lightweight, home-built, skin-tight suit of kevlar, fabric, rubber, and wire. Specially designed to protect against acid and electricity while providing minor protection from general harm and keeping everything squared away under your other armor. Accentuates your... survivability.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A custom-built backpack. Durable and carefully crafted to hold as much stuff as possible. This one is made from kevlar reinforced with thin metal sheets in hopes of protecting it and its contents.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
